RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 15400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 11 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 11 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIMPLE SOUVENIR was well rated early, made a three wide move on the turn, took over leaving the turn and drew off to prove much the best under a mild drive. DENALI RAE was settled three wide, came four wide into the lane and rallied w ell for the place award. RUN LAURA RUN dueled for the lead two wide and made a bid on the turn to gain a short lead, but weakened in the drive. PAYNT BY NUMBER dueled for the lead on the inside and weakened. HIGHWAY QUEEN was reserved early, angled out in the lane and had no rally. UNION RALLY chased the pace on the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Union Rally
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, inside turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Highway Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, angled out stretch, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Paynt by Number
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Simple Souvenir
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, 3 wide move turn, drew off stretch, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Run Laura Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, bid turn, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Denali Rae
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide turn, came 4 wide, rally for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: Z'S SO GOOD prompted the pace and made a three wide bid on the turn to take over nearing the quarter pole, then drew off in the lane to prove much the best under a mild drive. ON THE EDGE tracked the early pace two wide, came four wide into the drive and finished willingly for the place award while no match to the winner. DR GREENTHUMB tracked the pace on the inside, shifted out three wide leaving the turn and weakened, bested rest. MR. JEKYLL chased the pace four wide and was three to four wide on the turn and weakened. ROUND ROBIN failed to respond. GRILLO set the pace two wide and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Dr Greenthumb
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, shift 3 wide, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: On the Edge
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 2 wide, came 4 wide, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Grillo
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2 wide, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Z's So Good
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, drew off, mild drive

ENTRY.NAME: Round Robin
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Jekyll
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, 3-4 wide turn, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 14400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FACTOTUM set the pace two to three wide early, made a two wide bid to draw clear on the turn, then was roused leaving the turn and drew off to prove much the best, driving. CAIRO BOOGIE was off slowly, reserved early, advanced on the inside, then shifted off the inside and made a three wide move on the turn, proved to be no match for the winner while clearly second best. HE CAME TRUE was settled early towards the inside, then was between rivals leaving the half mile marker, two wide by the quarter pole and bested the rest. SIMILAR TASTE lacked a rally. ADY'S MUNNY tracked the early pace, then was three to four wide on the turn and tired. GRATITUDE ATTITUDE chased the pace three wide and stopped. YANKEE EMPIRE pressed the pace on the inside and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Yankee Empire
ENTRY.OWNER: Life Is Good Stables and Hart Sr William D
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: He Came True
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, between 1/2, 2 wide 1/4, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Cairo Boogie
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, advanced inside backstretch, 3 wide 1/4, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Ady's Munny
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, 3-4 wide 2nd turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Gratitude Attitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Factotum
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 2-3 wide, bid 2 wide, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Similar Taste
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, lacked rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 18100. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 11 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 11 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 11 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Pri ce $16,000, if for $14,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPIKES SHIRL pressed the early pace and made a two wide bid on the turn to take over, then drew out leaving the turn and remained clear to prove best, driving. GRAB THE GOLD was bumped at the start, chased the pace on the inside, came three wide into the lane and finished well to be clearly second best. TURNPIKE BOB set a pressured pace on the inside and weakened in the drive, held show award. ROCKET BLAST chased the pace three wide and came five wide into the lane and had no kick. READY AND RICH tracked the pace four wide and then came four wide into the lane but was empty in the lane. HASHTAG WINNING was outrun early, came wide into the lane and had no rally. STRIKING MOON was settled early, wide on the turn and had no rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Turnpike Bob
ENTRY.OWNER: Imaginary Stables and Simoff Andrew L
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, weakened, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Grab the Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased inside, came 3 wide, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Spikes Shirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, bid 2 wide, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Striking Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, wide turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Hashtag Winning
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, came wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Rocket Blast
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 3 wide turn, came 5 wide, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Ready and Rich
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 4 wide, came 4 wide, empty,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS CONVEYOR pressed the early pace from between rivals, then rated back and shifted out to make a three wide bid on the turn, drew off in the final furlong to prove much the best under a drive. MISCHIEF MELODY vied for the lead three wide, then set the pace and moved to the inside on the turn, then was headed leaving the quarter pole and was no match for the winner while clearly second best. ELEGANT TASTE was settled early, advanced three to four wide on the turn but lacked a late rally to best the rest. WIN FOR LAILA chased the pace on the inside and weakened. ASGATA pressed the early pace on the inside and weakened. CRIMSON LILLE was settled early and between rivals on the turn and had no rally. SKIPOVER lacked a rally. JO AMY chased the pace four wide and weakened. SANTAFE EXPRESS failed to menace. AWESOME TAP was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Skipover
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early inside, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Win for Laila
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, inside turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Asgata
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Conveyor
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed between, rated, bid 3 wide, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Crimson Lille
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, between horses turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Elegant Taste
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3-4 wide turn, came 4 wide, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Jo Amy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Mischief Melody
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3 wide, clear inside turn, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Santafe Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Tap
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Purse 28000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 11 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 11 Allowed 4 lbs. (Ra ces Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRA LAD broke in at the start, then settled into stride nicely on the backstretch, started to advance three wide on the turn and came four wide into the lane, closed full of run under left handed crop urging as he was trying to lug in leaving the sixteenth marker, then got up in time to score the win. ROMANTIC GAMBLE stalked the early pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn to vie for command three wide, then led late but was caught. CEES GET DEGREES dueled for the early lead and then vied for the lead on the inside by the quarter pole, dug in gamely but was outfinished late. CONDITION ONE dueled for the lead two wide, then vied for command between rivals by the quarter pole and to the furlong marker and then faded late. GRAND WISER chased the pace two wide and angled out in the lane and had no kick. BOURBON CURRENCY was bumped at the start, reserved early and had no rally. DEB'S GUNFIGHTER was reserved early on the inside and lacked a rally. NORTHERN SPY tracked the pace on the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Deb's Gunfighter
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Spy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, saved ground turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Currency
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, settled back, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Tra Lad
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, settled, 3 wide 1/4, came 4 wide, closed, in time,

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Wiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 2 wide turn, angled out, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Cees Get Degrees
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, vied inside 1/4 pole, out kicked

ENTRY.NAME: Condition One
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, vied between horses 1/4-1/8, late fade

ENTRY.NAME: Romantic Gamble
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, caught late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 13100. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 11. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lb s. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOLK HERO prompted the pace and made a three wide bid when ready entering the turn and shook clear, then drew off in the lane to prove much the best, driving. CAR LADY was reserved early, advanced three wide on the turn and then shifted out and came five wide into the lane and rallied well to be clearly second best. WICKED T was outrun early, came wide into the lane and had a belated rally to gain the show award late. SWITCHRATTLENROLL was reserved early, then split rivals by the quarter pole, angled out in the lane and lost the show award late. SERENE WARRIOR was well placed early and made a bid two wide on the turn and then weakened in the drive. MIKEY'S JEWEL was settled while four wide early, then was three to four wide on the turn and was empty in the lane. PERKEO tracked the early pace in between rivals, then was three wide on the turn and tired. HOLMDEL PARK vied for the lead on the inside and gave way. TEACHER DRAMA tracked the pace five wide and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Serene Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed 2 wide, bid 2 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Perkeo
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace between horses, 3 wide turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Mikey's Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle 4 wide, 3-4 wide turn, came 4 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Switchrattlenroll
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, split 1/4, angled out, lost show late

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked T
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, came wide upper stretch, belatedly, got show

ENTRY.NAME: Car Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, 3 wide 5/16, came 5 wide, rallied, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Holmdel Park
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Folk Hero
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted paced 3 wide, bid 3 wide, drew clear, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Teacher Drama
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 5 wide, stopped
